meanings.definition: A dentist specializing in the extraction of teeth.
meanings.sent1: The exodontist removed my painful tooth.
meanings.sent2: I have an appointment with the exodontist tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: The exodontist joked that he could make a living from pulling teeth.
meanings.sent4: Watching the exodontist work felt like witnessing a tooth extraction magician.
meanings.sent5: The exodontist's steady hands made the tooth removal seem almost effortless.
